name: Scopus-Indexed Springer 4th International Conference on Intelligent Sustainable Systems [ICISS 2021]
content: This 4th International Conference on Intelligent Sustainable Systems \[ICISS 2021\] organized on 26-27 February, 2021 by SCAD College of Engineering and Technology, Tirunelveli, TamilNadu, India provides unique opportunity to bring together academicians, researchers, scientists and research scholars to share and exchange ideas and practical solutions towards achievement of intelligent sustainable systems for a more sustainable future. This conference also aims to create an interdisciplinary platform to share their research ideas on developing new models and algorithms for sustainable development and provide intelligent paradigm shifts to deal with uncertainties and imprecise problems in real-world.
organizers: SCAD College of Engineering and Technology
